name: Norman Long Sword, 110cm
description: A LARP and Cosplay foam sword, the Norman Sword is a great latex long sword. This foam replica of a 110cm one hand and a half Norman knight sword is perfect for any fighter character. The blade is well balanced and a strong guard will protect your hand.

name: Dai Katana, 105cm
description: The Dai Katana is the preferred weapon of the Samurai.  Its intricate leather wrapped handle is unmatched in beauty. The subtle simplicity of this ancient weapon is only surpassed by its voracity on the battle field.  Are you ready for the way of the warrior?

name: Dark Elven Long Blade, 110cm
description: The Dark Elven latex long sword is a viciously beautiful weapon rarely seen by the living. Capable of inflicting damage from every angle this sleek foam sword gives the underworld the upper hand. Blades in the pommel and hand guard allow you to assassinate quietly or to inflict damage when in close quarters.  Add a little poison to the blade and you will...

name: Trollball Slayer Sword, 110cm
description: The trollball slayer sword  was created for a medieval game of rugby played with swords and no armor.The idea behind this sword was to create a blade heavy sword creating an advantage when striking your opponent.  The basket hilt  protects the hand against glancing blows and the pommel and tip is re-enforced with Kevlar to prevent tearing....

name: Long Elven Blade,110cm
description: A slim and elegant elven latex long sword is the ideal blade for sophisticated warriors. The blade, from tip to pommel, appears as a one-piece and is colored in a quite matt steel look. 110cm

name: Noble Long Sword, 110cm
description: The noble sword has an intricate renaissance rapier style hilt with a long straight blade. 110cm.  This weapon gives life to a lost era and constructed with finess.

name: King Long Sword, 110cm
description: The King latex long sword is a nobleman's larp bastard sword and may be wielded by all. 110cm. This impressive sword has a long straight blade ending at the diamond shaped cross guard which repeats itself on the pommel.

name: Corsair Cutlass Sword, 95cm
description: The Corsair cutlass medieval fantasy latex sword is an updated version of the traditional pirate sword. 95cm. The curved blade resembles that of a saber but the basket hilt gives it a more pirate look. Either way swashbuckling has been renewed with this impressive sword.

name: Bladesinger Long Sword
description: Introducing the of the Bladesinger latex sword. The unique feature that distinguishes this weapon from the rest is the simple elven style and handle length.  110cm. When used by two hands the bladesinger sword can be wielded like any modern day katana but in the hands of an elf elder it could be one of the most deadly weapons in the realm....

name: Soulstealer Long Sword, 110cm
description: The soulstealer is a high fantasy latex sword will surely take your breath away. It is 110cm of deadly beauty adorned with a colored jewel. This larp weapon can be used as a cosplay sword, medieval sword or even a fantasy sword depending on your event or era. The sword handle can be used with two hands and its serrated edge and curved blade gives this...

name: Choppa Long Sword, 110cm
description: A LARP and Cosplay foam sword, the Choppa Sword is a great latex long sword. This ferocious and feral 110cm long foam sword is the perfect weapon for any orc or savage character.

name: First Crusader Long Sword, 110cm
description: A LARP and Cosplay foam sword, the First Crusader Sword is an impressive latex long sword. This foam replica of a 110cm one hand and a half Crusader sword is perfect for any fighter character. The blade is well balanced and a strong guard will protect your hand.

name: Jian War Long Sword, 110cm
description: The Jian War Sword is a beautiful weapon that has a long tapered blade and servers the exact purpose for which it was intended. This well balanced sword has a small round guard that does not hinder movement and an ornate pommel symbolic of the simple elegance the Chinese has to offer.
